title: Heat
description: Troy Parker, the third baseman for the Paul Johnson Rebels, has it all. Close friends, a loving family, and he gets to make something of his favorite pastime: to play baseball whenever possible.His world soon changes when he meets Jaime Stone. As their love for one another grows, things seem too good to be true. Unbeknownst to them both, a wicked curveball is headed in their direction; one that will change everything.An unexpected death throws Troy’s life into a profound chaos. Seclusion is his only means of dealing with the situation at hand. With only a bottle of Jack to comfort him, he soon wonders whether he can overcome the loss he’s been dealt. Can he turn away from the booze, or will it threaten more than just his life?
author: H.K. Taylor
